articles.description: Pakistan host England in the first Test at Multan Cricket Stadium – follow text & score updates plus radio commentary.
articles.title: Pakistan vs England LIVE: first Test, day four, Multan Cricket Stadium – cricket score, radio commentary and text updates

articles.description: Former Sheffield United defender George Baldock dies at the age of 31.
articles.title: George Baldock dies: Former Sheffield United defender found dead aged 31

articles.description: Manchester City's victory over Barcelona was just the start of their Women's Champions League challenge - but it showed what they are capable of.
articles.title: Man City lay down marker in Champions League win over Barca

articles.description: Joe Root says there are “many more runs still to get” after he overhauled Sir Alastair Cook to become England’s all-time leading Test runscorer.
articles.title: Joe Root says there are 'many more runs to get' after breaking England record

articles.description: Pernille Harder's hat-trick ensures Arsenal's return to the Women's Champions League ends in defeat in an end-to-end encounter away at German champions Bayern Munich.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 5-2 Arsenal: Pernille Harder hat-trick sinks Gunners in Champions League opener

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary, score updates and match stats as England take on Greece in the UEFA Nations League at Wembley.
articles.title: UEFA Nations League LIVE: England vs Greece - score, radio commentary & text updates

articles.description: A six-hour Manchester United board meeting concluded on Tuesday with Erik ten Hag still in position as the club's manager. Why has there been no comment on his future from the club?
articles.title: Erik ten Hag future: Why are Man Utd silent on manager's future?

articles.description: Joe Root overtakes Sir Alastair Cook to become England's highest Test run-scorer of all time.
articles.title: Joe Root overtakes Sir Alastair Cook to become England's all-time leading Test run-scorer

articles.description: India boost their semi-final hopes with an 82-run thrashing of Sri Lanka at the Women's T20 World Cup.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup: India seal 82-run victory to eliminate Sri Lanka

articles.description: Wimbledon will remove line judges and bring in an electronic line calling system from 2025.
articles.title: Wimbledon: Line judges to be removed and electronic calling brought in from 2025
